short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture ideas quickly with a keyboard shortcut. They will be saved to your TweetMInd account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TweetMind Chrome extension is a companion tool for the TweetMind app, allowing users to capture ideas and thoughts effortlessly while browsing. With a quick keyboard shortcut, you can save your inspirations, tweets, and notes directly to your TweetMind account, ready for review and expansion. Designed for speed and convenience, this extension helps you keep track of your ideas without disrupting your online activities, making it ideal for users who rely on TweetMind to organize their creative flow.
